alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 1:12PM MDT until July 15 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Judith Basin County in central Montana... Chouteau County in north central Montana... East central Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 215 PM MDT. * At 111 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Highwood to near Geyser, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Benton, Big Sandy, Geraldine, Geyser, Boneau, Highwood, St. Pierre, Parker School, Carter, Shonkin, Loma, Square Butte, Iliad and Virgelle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
